title: Cleo's sweet chilli con carne
ingredients: ['1 teaspoon coconut oil', '1 large onion, sliced', '2 cloves garlic, crushed and chopped', '250g organic beef mince (15 to 20% fat)', '1 Knorr® beef stock pot', '1 teaspoon Bovril®', '1 pinch salt and pepper', '1 teaspoon tomato puree', '1/2 teaspoon mild chilli powder', '1/2 teaspoon garam masala', '1/2 teaspoon cumin', '1/2 teaspoon ground spice', '1/2 teaspoon balsamic vinegar', '400g chopped tomatoes', '400g kidney beans']
